posts.text:
Monitor Type: Flat Panel LCD TFT (Active Matrix)
Size: 19 inch
Contrast Ratio: 2,000:1
Aspect Ratio: 16:10
Brightness: 300 cd/m²
Response Time: 2 ms
Dot Pitch: 0.285 mm
Color Depth: 24-bit (16.7M Colors)
Viewable Picture Size: 19 in.
Digital Video Input Standard: DVI-D
orm Factor: Desktop
Resolutions supported: 1440 x 900
Synchronization Range - Vertical : 56 - 75 Hz
Synchronization Range - Horizontal : 30 - 81 kHz
Max. Viewing Angle - Horizontal : 160
Max. Viewing Angle - Vertical : 160
Native (Recommended) Resolution: 1440 x 900
"CNET Product brief"
Description: The Samsung SyncMaster 906BW is a 19 in, flat panel computer monitor.Compared to other flat panel monitors on the market, it is relatively inexpensive at around $260.This unit features a 1440x900 native resolution.Weighs 9.3 lbs.
Pros: Has 16:10 aspect ratio, which is more favorable than some similarly priced monitors.By way of comparison, the average cost of a product with this favorable an aspect ratio is $470.Its wide viewing angle (160 degrees) is useful whenever the screen is being viewed by more than one person at the same time.Accepts DVI input, which allows for greater signal clarity than traditional VGA.
Cons: None noted, given available product data.
Suitability: A flat panel monitor, suited for those who want a spacious thin screen monitor.The 2 ms response time of this screen makes it ideal for fast-moving games and for watching movies.
Value: In view of its relatively inexpensive price, this monitor has great features for the money.For example, when it comes to viewable screen size, the average price of flat panel monitors with similar viewable size is quite a bit more -- in fact around $320.
Heimildir: 
http://reviews.cnet.com/lcd-monitors/sa
 ... 27972.html
http://www.epinions.com/specs/Samsung_906BW_Monitor
Vill skoða skipti á einhverjum massive turn, antec dark fleet, haf x eða 922, eða einhvern svona gaming turn, stóran 
 
er í reykjavík núna og verð frammá sunnudag O_O
er með haf 922. hvað viltu borga á milli?

borga á milli, 
http://www.thor.is/?PageID=52
haf 922 kostar bara 20, og sanngjarnt verð er 20 fyrir svona skjá
Já, nei. ég borgaði 17k fyrir 22" samsung syncmaster 1 árs gamlan skjá, og hann er með betri upplausn en þessi skjár

20k er engan veginn sanngjarnt fyrir þennan skjá  
 nema þetta sé eh ofur, ert að fá notaða 24" á 20-25þús og þetta er 19", btw getur fengið slatta af góðum 22" skjám notuðum fyrir 15k ..
færð kannski 5-8k fyrir þennan skjá. annars er haf 922 ekki til sölu hann er of merkilegur fyrir svona skjá
